text: Bran thought about it. 'Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?' 'That is the only time a man can be brave,' his father told him. -Ned Stark, A Game of Thrones
Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities. -Tyrion Lannister, A Game of Thrones
What do we say to the Lord of Death? Not today. -Syrio Forel, A Game of Thrones
We don't rise to the level of our expectations, we fall to the level of our training -Archilochus
Be yourself; everyone else is taken. -Oscar Wilde
When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love. -Marcus Aurelius
You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams. -Dr. Seuss
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough. -Mae West

Most coders think debugging software is about fixing a mistake. Debugging's actually all about finding the bug. About understanding why the bug was there to begin with. About knowing that its existence was no accident. It came to you to deliver a message, like an unconscious bubble floating to the surface, popping with a revelation you've secretly known all along. -Elliot, Mr. Robot
